node.title: Police say shooting death of rapper Chris Habiyakare was targeted attack
node.alt: Digital images of two men in masks and hoodies.
node.description: Detectives have released images of two suspects they want to identify as they investigate the shooting death of rapper Chris Habiyakare in Melbourne's west.
node.content:
["Police investigating the shooting death of rapper Chris Habiyakare in Melbourne's west in August believe the incident was a targeted attack.", "Mr Habiyakare was shot during an altercation with intruders in his home in Essex Street, Sunshine, on August 24.", "Investigators said a group of people armed with weapons, including a gun, forced their way into the house.", "Two men and three women who were at the house as guests of Mr Habiyakare fled the property, with one woman smashing a window to get out.", "A physical altercation took place during which Mr Habiyakare was shot.", "Police have released images of\u00a0two men they want to identify as part of their investigation.\u00a0", "Detectives also want to hear from anyone who may have been in the area and may be able to\u00a0provide dash-cam footage.\u00a0", "Police believe\u00a0it was a targeted incident, but have been unable to determine a motive for the shooting.", "Officers had attended the property on August 21 following reports of a physical altercation.\u00a0Police are investigating whether that\u00a0incident is linked to the shooting three days later.", "", "
Chris Habiyakare was shot during an altercation with intruders on August 24.
", "Detective Inspector Tim Day from the Homicide Squad urged anyone with information about the shooting to come forward.", "\"I believe there are people out there who can identify those involved in Chris's death,\" he said.", "\"That identification may be from recognising the people depicted in these images\u00a0or because they have knowledge of who was involved, or even why the incident occurred.", "\"At this time, we have a group of people out there who we believe are still in possession of the firearm.\"", "Inspector Day said Mr Habiyakare was known to police and had a history of involvement with drugs.", "\"However he was also much loved by his family and friends, all of whom are still grieving his loss and searching for answers as to why this has occurred.\"", "\"We need to speak to anyone who can shed light on the motive for the shooting and why Chris might have been targeted.\"", "Anyone with information is urged to call CrimeStoppers on 1800 333 000."]
